Rep.ReportSql: select g.SerialNumbers, i.ItemCode, g.State, g.ItemName, g.Quantity, g.CheckQuantity, (select Quantity from stock where SkuCode = g.SkuCode) as SurplusQuantity, (select SendInTime from stock_batchlocation where SerialNumbers = g.SerialNumbers) as SendInTime, (select WhsName from warehouse where WhsId = g.WmsId) as WmsName from goodsreceiptline g join Item i on i.ItemId = g.ItemId where @Param1
Rep.TotalSql: select count(0) from goodsreceiptline g join Item i on i.ItemId = g.ItemId where @Param1

Rep.ReportSql: select s.LogisticsNumber, s.LineName, s.ItemCode, s.ItemName, s.UnitPrice, s.Quantity, s.Consignee, s.ConsigneePhone from stock_stockkjtoutrecord s where RecordType = 3 and @Param1
Rep.TotalSql: select count(0) from stock_stockkjtoutrecord s where RecordType = 3 and @Param1
